scripts.build-main-min: npm run build-main && uglifyjs build/CaveView/js/CaveView.js -cm --preamble "// threejs.org/license" > build/CaveView/js/CaveView-min.js
scripts.build-cw-min: npm run build-cw && uglifyjs build/CaveView/js/workers/caveWorker.js -cm --preamble "// threejs.org/license" > build/CaveView/js/workers/caveWorker-min.js
scripts.build: npm run build-main && npm run build-tw
scripts.build-min: npm run build-main-min && npm run build-tw-min
